content: I want to repay my loan amount but I have forgotten the PIN so the app is locked and I am unable to pay the installment amount. Please investigate and resolve this as soon as possible so that I can pay the full amount. Still the issue is pending after multiple reminders. And the harrasment message are start from your side for pay the loan amount. Need the help for reset the pin so I can pay the Fully amount today.

Many times I have taken the loan and paid before the due date,but yesterday was my due date and due to national holidays bank were closed,today morning I paid the amount,but when I reapply for the other loan , simply they just rejected,it's not good relationship with customer . think before taking the loan,they charged process fee every time,and charges high rate of interest

Great app with quick services. I have only one issue, the UI glitches regularly when I open the app. I use dark mode on my phone and when I open the app, it opens in light mode with the font colour also being white to reflect the dark mode preference. This means that I am unable to read the words displayed making it unusable. I have to switch my phone to light mode then refresh the app in order to use it then switch back to dark mode afterwards. Reinstalling the app does not fix this

Many times I have taken the loan and paid before due date but this time amount showing credited into my account on app but after 24hrs still it is not credited. Even still reflecting thay amt. Credited to your bank account. What the hell is happening.

Many time I have taken the loan and personally I don't have any issue with this but yesterday while I paid my last loan within the time period and applied for a new loan thair is showing you are not eligible reapply after 180 days is this any kind of joke I need money that's why I applied for a loan with this much high interest charges and possessing fee . This is totally frustrated also I mailed it but no response from your team.

The best loan app ever with low interest rate, long term payment and easy to access. There certifications are genuine and you nothing to worry about. I have been using it for years and i recommend branch international financial services

I have had a chance to get an instant loan from other lending apps but truth be told no one matches the efficiency of Branch. I can say without any fear that this is the most efficient and customer friendly lending app I have ever met. I highly recommend it to other users because it's trustworthiness is something to behold. I could have given it even ten stars if it was allowed. Thank you Branch.

Applied 2 days back. Every 6 hours I get an alert asking me to enter my Legal Name. I do that, again resets and I get a notification asking me enter the legal name again. Foolishly I am doing so. I don't know what is wrong with this application. Either Approved or Denied is sufficient but not causing inconvenience to us and not to mention waste of time. Pathetic!! Changing the review as they came back promptly and resolved my phone issue. Thank you for your help.

Well, to be factual... I have onced dumped your app & even find a means of yabbing those in charge of the app due to the disappointment I had with you guys about 2years back... Not until recently that a friend re-introduce it to me...though I was reluctant but I decided to give it a shot... & to my amazement, I got the help almost immediately after filling the right infos.(within 2minutes of application). It came in @the very perfect time, I appreciated & repaid the same day! God bless Branch!

Overall everything's good about the app, except the processing fee and GST, it almost deduct the quater percent of loan to be credit for a customer. If you could help with it by any side it would be helpful. Thank you.

I had closed all my loan. After closing I am unable to take loan. I had been applied for increased credit limit. Bank statement was also verified successfully. But they didn't give the credit limit to take a loan. It seems that they are still reviewing the application. Customer service is very bad. No one replied for my query ticket and mail also. Hello I put an mail before 10 days. But no one replied. Please update in app.

This is one of the best Apps I've used. I ordered for an ATM Card and it's delivered to my doorstep. The Card works perfectly well. However, I would like you guys to Increase Significantly, your Free Monthly Transfers and the Loan Amount to your Regular Customers. I highly recommend this App to whoever that's interested!

Great in all ramifications. They didn't bother me much on my loan repayment even as it was long overdue. They only called or sent reminders once in a while, to encourage me in repayment. Branch, you're the best!

Honestly Branch deserves more than 5stars! The loan application is super easy and it is disbursed in a very short time, has a very reasonable interest rate. I've tried downloading and trying many loan apps all of them were saying they can't give me a loan because of something about credit report issue(even palmpay sefüòías much as I used their app, after many months they suggested only ‚Ç¶1k loan to meüßê)but everything was easy with branch. Now, I've solved the emergency that required my borrowing

I have cleared my previous loan on time without any delay. When i applying for the next loan it was showing try after 30 days. Now after 30 days when I applying it is showing apply after 180 days.. it is not acceptable.. they will say el"eligibility criteria is not matching". After a good payment structure, good cibil, 100% payment record what else you need?? This is absolutely unacceptable.. it is very disappointing..

It is a very good application and I got the amount immediately after applying the loan It is an app that can be used only when it is very urgent to not get much cash because if there is more lgability, you will get more cash. Everything is fine but For example if we take Rs 1000 now we don't get the full amount and there will be charges and stuff I don't see any problem other than the eligibility given to you money ü§ë üí∞ will be given

I am using this app since 2021.. no doubt the app is genuine but the internet rate and processing fee is too high, if you calculate the disbursement amount with the interest rate it goes above 30-35%. They first said "the higher loan amout the lower interest rate" but actuality is "the higher loan amount the higher interest rate and processing fees"....!! There are many other platform to take loan with lower interest rate, so be wise and careful when and where you are taking loans from....!!

I would say it's a great app , but for more than ymonths I made a transactions that never went through and my 6k going to a year has still not been refunded I'm waiting for a year so their damage fee can be huge when i file my cases. Despite reaching customer care and yet no solution to date, I'm very displeased about that aspect of their service.

In starting It was unknown to me but this is a good loan app. It is helpful and affordable. It's interest rate is also very affordable. Its payment is also good and flexible. It is a very good loan app. Only one problem is that there are less banks available to disburse the amount. It should be solved by them.

Really felt bad experience I am paying correct my payment but their something else make me to paying extra payment..now it's asking for pin code but I didn't set any pin now I don't know when I have to pay nu seriously worst with this...I really can't open mine and can't able to pay customer care number was switched off and I sent mail and given my account number pan etc but still they didn't respond.. really the app is threatening me

I applied for a loan a few minutes ago, and although the loan details and interest rate are visible on the dashboard, I'm unable to withdraw it. The wallet keeps showing an error message. Despite reaching out to customer care, there has been no response. Such experiences can impact the reputation of your services.

Once got a loan from this App but after paying my loan that too before due date they simple put me on a waiting list without any reason as I was in need of for some emergency..Can't say it's a good App... Seems they were not able to built the trust of their costumers... I mail them but replying back that executive were looking into it..Chat mode in App replying with all unnecessary answers....If there 8s Negative - rank I'll give -3....

Very impressive loan app. However, after meeting requirements, by repaying the loan as at when due; I was surprised that, the app lowered the accessible subsequent loan that came afterwards. The subsequent loan that came afterwards, was expected to be higher, not lower. In this aspect, I was not impressed at all.

I have been using a "branch online loan app" for some time now. But some days ago, i got the surprise of my life when i applied for a loan and was denied the loan, and was also given 40 days to reapply again. According to "branch organisation," it was due to some eligibility criteria issues, which i am totally confused about. Then i contacted customer service, and there was no valid information or genuine excuse for that. Now, the app is of no use for me, so i want deletion of my personal data.

Thank you for helping me, only this app help me to get instant loan without salaried, no matter what it's from remote places or in any other's places they instantly provide the credit to my account according to my bank credit score. What a fair!!!

Such a pathetic app ever. I have foreclosed the amount because I was able to arrange the funds. However post that they have completely denied helping out later saying I'm not eligible. I shouldn't have paid the amount to you guys. I'll ask my friends also not to use your pathetic app and service. There is no customer support to connect or share this.

I repaid the loan on time and instead of increasing the credit limit..they have decreased it very disappointed with the service...will not recommend this app .. there is no point in taking loan and repaying it on time ... worst experience

"I've had a very good experience with the Branch app.The user-friendly interface, quick loan approvals, and transparent terms make it a standout choice for anyone seeking financial assistance. I highly recommend Branch to anyone in need of a hassle-free loan solution." I would like to request to plz provide higher loan amount. I have used this app first time and get only approval for 500. Plz make it higher.

Customer service is non existent, been reporting for a double payment for a month now and no update so far, number for calling doesnt work, reply takes forever, still not solving the issue. They have not returned my money. This is the worst service i have ever received even worst than actual bank. I dont recommend this app to anyone at all.

I've been trying to make a repayment due today, since morning, but I've not been able to access the app. What is going on? As if that is not enough, before the due date which is today, I've been receiving threat calls, saying my loan is overdue. What really is going on? Please rectify this ASAP, SO I CAN MAKE MY REPAYMENT. PS: IT IS NOT NETWORK ISSUE NEITHER IS IT MY PHONE. I'VE BEEN DOING OTHER THINGS ONLINE AND MY PHONE IS WORKING PERFECTLY FINE..

Onboarding is excellent. Service is good & very fast. Only problem is less limit. Please increase limit It is a very good app, I have got my work done, this app also provides good customer service. You also install it now and immediately confirm and get your small work done. Stay connected with (Branch International Finance), Thank You BIF!

Very bad experience from the app, after clearly all loan amount before due date, the loan was rejected, even I don't have any dues in any loan, my cibil score is more the 780,but still, app shows not eligible, from call centre they called and told me to pay the loan amount before 3days so that, your loan amount will increase immediately, they called me more than 20 times, so i paid all amount before 4 days of due date, after paying the amount, there is no loan available, it's a very big scam ,

This app is really genuine before this i tried true balance and never miss there payment even i always paid before my due date but they denied my loan but on this app if you pay their payment on time they never disappount you they started with low limit then after your repayment this app increase limit time to time so really fully satisfied with this app....

Please can you guys make your app like pay meaning you should make someone's card details on the app available just like pay including passwords you know what I mean check pay and see what they did. This is to be of easy help to those who forgot their passwords to their cards you can make it secured by requesting the user to put in their transaction password to complete the process.

App is fluid, easy to use, and looks professional. It's just annoying when I get many unnecessary notifications (seems to be better now), and it also seems like nobody cares to respond to user's reviews. Additionally, the app may not be suitable for medium-sized to big loans; at least from my usage. Unlocking higher amounts for loans seems to be very slow. After taking and repaying 3 loans, my offer has increased from just #21,000 to #43,000 so far

Very bad experience first it was nice I got limit and i had paid all the amount on time and also I had taken loan more than 5 times but suddenly after repayment when I go to apply again it shows you are not elegible to apply the loan come after 180 days , but why I had done the payment on time. So i think it's not that much good app

the app is good though but the reason why I'm not giving them 5 Star ‚≠ê is because of the way they are conducting their loans process ,I believe someone that took the loan as a first timer and repay it even before the due date deserves to take a limit in loan, not the same amount anymore, please management should look into that , thank you üôè

To obtain loan is as simple as ABCD. And the amazing thing is that they do not call you to disturb your life like others. Try it when you are in distress and see how BRANCH will come to save you. Still can't stop talking about this awesome app, Still enjoying this awesome and amazing app

Nice loan app no hiccup since I started using this app their interest rate is fair enough but my issue is that they should try and be increasing the amount they disburse to clients who needs huge capital to solve one or two issues. For now am giving you guys 2stars maybe when you increase my next loan amount i will then give you 5stars.

This is awesome! Branch leads, others follow!! I was highly impressed with the speed at which loan was disbursed!!! I also love the app interface. God bless the Branch immensely. The interest rate is also friendly.

Best Loan App ever I saw in my life, No Hassel, Very Quick, Fast Customer Support, No Call harassment, Completely Safe and Secure, Loved it soo Much, Some suggestion :- Please provide options to delete or edit Contact Number, accounts, and small things because for this smaller things we have to wait for customer support to help us, lastly loan limit amount should increase after some successful repayment of loans because last time I got 1000 loan, now they only gave 500 its downgrade,ü•πü•π

I appreciate this app much more... it's easy to download deposit your money, Get loan due emergency and they give more rewards for paying bills and buying airtime.. it's easy to register under minutes....

Branch loan app is okay. You would get the loan immediately for whatever you need it for. But I didn't give it a 5 star because the interest is too high. I borrowed 12k and I paid back 16,200k. Your company should reduce the interest rate. Then you should also give option of repayment plan of 6 months too should in case someone gets a big amount of loan from your company.Thanks.

Worst service . I am Very Disappointed because I using last one year. I never miss any EMI all paid on time. My credit limit was 8000 but they decrease now 4000 I don't know what's wrong happening here. Please don't take loan on this plateform they're cheating with you even paid all Emi timely. Branch will reduce your credit limit Automatically. Very Disgusting

After my first successful loan with this app, I repaid even before the due date, but I reapplied, and it wasn't approved. After 60 days, I reapply, and it was also not approved. These people don't have enough money to offer, so they will make you believe the app is the perfect one by approving your first loan and then moving on to another person.

Best app ever, very smooth and professional in their dealings unlike most loan app, I will recommend this app to anyone who needs money urgently. Imagine getting a loan of 16k to pay back 21k in 2months... That's a very great offer for real. Keep up with the good work üëç I would give 10 stars if I could.

Very reliable, more advanced, very transparent and friendly with the most lowest interest/charges and a reasonable duration for payback. I think "Branch" is my most favourable loan app with cool and understandable preps.. üíï üíï üíï üíï

This app is one of the best you can find anywhere. I have been using this app since 2019 and they stand out. No embarrassment, very understanding, no difficulty. Their staff's are very matured in the way they approach customer.
Too many problem with the app, I tried to submit bank details, and the interface keeps loading and nothing happened after. I've not been able to access any of their services. Weak app

Too much bad experience with this app, the reason is that firstly it show me a credit limit of 8000 but after applying for the loan the app shows an page of approval and then it is showing that your eligible criteria is not fulfilled by the app....What nonsense is this, if I'm not eligible then show me it as earlier as possible why this stupidity is going on with this app.

It is the most easiest to use application. The entire process is transparent and very swift. Whether it is taking loan or repayment, everything is so well organized. I recommend this app wholeheartedly to anyone in need of a quick loan.

So, barch app is a overall good. I have no credit history, they give me loan of rs 1000 I'm really thankful for this üòçüëç But there are some thing which is not, company should consider to work on these things The interest rate and duration they offer is good but the processing fee after including the GST not good. So i would to give you my feedback that please please consider to charge low processing fee.Thanks In the end, evey RBI registered loan lender is good üëç they'll never cheat u

I had taken loan from branch twice had paid the total amount on time but still the next time I applied for the same amount they rejected my offer and also they the are stating that I am not eligible for the same loan they provided me before. I don't think I will be able to have my faith in this app in time of emergency

Branch is where your financial stress is sorted.. due to its honesty and trustworthiness it have become customers friendly it gives instant loans with little conditions and enough time to repay your loan compared to other apps.... I therefore recommend those who have no trust with lending apps to try branch and they will never regret.

I use this app since last three months. I regularly repay loan in time. I never missed any repayment date. Today I got approval and after confirming bank details, suddenly what happened my loan was rejected. I wrote to customer care but still I didn't get reply.

1) Simple registration, fast disbursement, low interest rate, no dubious way of manipulating loans amount, no hidden changes and about a month to repay loan are all quite good of the loan app. 2) Got an initial loan, paid back even before due date and noticed afterwards that I can't get loan for now that I should wait for 2 months! More than strange. I will still give 5 stars. Thank you for coming through for Nigerians during this very hardship period. Thank you once again

You people are trustworthy, becouse you done well to me, my sister use my details and borrowed credit to my account, and i come lost my phone number, for is almost 3years i don't know how to pay, but one day as i search you in Facebook, we communicated, and i gave you the phone number that she used and opened it, the great thing that you have done to me. I got a discount that even the money she borrow i no pay, thank you very much branch. You the best in Nigeria and even the world.

This is still the best loan app I have ever used. Very reliable with reasonable interest rate. Good app interface. Customer service is top notch. Try it today and you will never regret. ü•∞üòç I will give 10 ‚≠ê if available.

It was nice experience with Branch Personal Cash Loan application and easy to access and it's really supportive customer care and I am really appreciate for all team members of Branch Personal Cash Loan application for every emergency this application is very useful thanks for your supportüòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉüòÑ

As a new customer/user, my experience after repayment of loan is extremely bad... I found out that I wouldn't be around to repay the loan on the due date so I had to rush to repay yesterday,this was simply to avoid defaulting on the loan... It was a big shock to me that Branch would not even allow me to apply for at least the initial amount loaned me, I am asked to reapply in 60 days time! I advise people not to rush to repay loan but wait until the due date to repay as you might get punished.

I was paying the due on time and before time for several times but after the loan amount increased they rejected my loan as if i am not repaying on time.I was in urgent need of money. What's the use of taking loan if we don't get when we're in need? So much disappointed with this "branch" app. There's no option to contact to customer care also. This app don't deserve to get even 1 star.

I took the loan and it's been more than 48 hours. In app it's showing that amount is disbursed but I haven't received the amount in my account. And I can't find any customer care executive number in app.

Good application with fast loan service. As my suggestion, you may consider adding a feature for paying the loan within the application, eliminating the need to navigate to the M-Pesa menu, etc. I mean all activities should be completed within your application.

I forgot my security password in branch application. I'm unable to reset my password. I tried to contact customer care but there's no response. I can't pay my loan amount. I request you to solve my issue as soon as possible. Thank you.

Great app! In emergency no app is going to give me a loan but this app amazing, but payment received afte 2-3 hours and also its charges are little high. Human pshycology while in financial problem we never see intrest and charges. If you want small loan go through it it's very helpful.

Seems like fraud. Approved ‚Çπ2500 and says ‚Çπ2206 has been disbursed. I received only ‚Çπ1 in my account. Edit 1: After the first response, I wish to tell that there is no response in the in-app channels of support even after 24 hours. Also, the phone number for call support is always switched off.
Branch does bother one with calls and text messages. Plus the app is very easy to use and also has room for investment. Its safe and reliable.

Reliable, fast for transaction.the reaon am not giving 5 star is loan.. But in terms of the loan have been using the loan for months borrowing and paying back on time,unfortunately there was this time I couldn't pay on due date after making payment have been suspended of not borrowing money it's keep telling after 60days of reviews and I still keep on using the app for transaction. My 60 days of trial is now x3 which I need to try again next year but this is annoying.

very easy to access and the interest rate is affordable but it was difficult for me to transfer money from their wallet to my account number so I have returned your money back to you. I am not paying the interest because the money never leaves your account or bank before. Thanks

This app really helped me out and I did all my repayment on time except one or two, it has been three damn years since I got a loan from these guys all they keep saying is try in the next days like it's so embarrassing, despite sending emails asking for the service back they still neglecting my request for 3 good years, comeon now guys you are good but this is not good at all.

They take the repayment amount and they don't give the loan in return because they are the bigger liers the take too much interest and then provide the loan for example if you got the amount of 6000 then they will only give 5304 rupees but in repayment amount they will take 6404 rupees is this correct if think then apply and if you not then report and send this to everyone who don't know about this type of fraud company or a loan app. Thank you . üôèüôèüôè

It was good app i have taken loan amount of rs 500 twice and it disbursed in the account but my third load of 1000 I applied it shows disbursed in the app and repayment option and all, also disbursement message comes to me but that amount wasn't deposited in my account, it's been 24 hrs but the loan is not received to me yet and ir shows disbursed in Branch App. Take a step on it team Branch because i have done email they r not responding

Branch app so far is about the best. I recommend it. Have not really had any issue using it. I would have given 5* assuming they can improve on duration of loan payment and a bit reduction of interest. Otherwise, i sayüëå

There are three loan apps I can recommend to anyone. Branch is one of them. Honestly, believe me, when I give review, I give it for having read about the reviews of others & for having used the product myself; not once, twice but many times. Feel free to use Branch.

Today, I used this App for the second time after a gap of 16 months. I'm happy it worked faster for me. Previously, I had written... There are many reviews which are opposite to others. Initially, the maximum principal amount was 2,500. I took out two loans and paid them off ahead of schedule. The primary sum is now 1500rs for the third time. I have no idea why!üòø

This is definitely one of the best,if not the very best Loan App ever.The loan duration is long and the interest rate is low.And no undue harassment by the agents of the company. Keep soaring high - you are the best

I so much Love this app your one of the best so far that I came across , this exactly what we need I can borrow with a less change and even more to save for features use.

Branch is the best and understanding online banking system, about two years ago I lost my personal belongings together with my mobile phone, after awhile I got to no tht my branch account is with outstanding dept of about 20k Which I didn't apply for, I wrote to branch that's I don't apply for any loan that I lost my personal belongings. Aap is too good and helpful but I get shocked after repaying on time my credit limit decrease. So sad and I have been worried. In time of need at least my last limt has to be provided.

Prompt consideration of loan application, patient even when loan gets overdue without embarrassing loan applicants. Low interest rate etc. Branch is simply the BEST of ALL. Patience and Courtesy defines Branch App

After paying my installment before time Branch text me that you are frod person and we send you legal notice etc I contect with help desk but only they said it's technical issue but daily I have received 2 text message that we going to case on you it's. At last I pay my all remaining amount and go out with this lone app.
It's good if you need Money urgently. Less paper works. Although you can get less money at first. The more you do the better your credit score is.

Had rated 5 but even when my loan repayment day is jan1st 2024 that too of 795 ‚Çπ (1600‚Çπ total) sending me irritating messages, make payment prior to the due date etc that too three 4 times just irritating is the reason for my one star.once i finish on feb 1st am done wuth this app, if its that there was lapse in repayment after due date its understandable, when they have charged me interest for one month or two and asking to make payment prior to due date is not professionalism in any manner.

Branch app is the worst app that has ever been If you are looking for an app to get money then branch app should be the least of your priorities...they don't lend loans they are sorta scamm app to be honest..first loan..you replay it on time and some other time you get an emergency you ask for it again they say wait for 90 days and keep.the app..again an emergency hits you and you remember you want money come again after 90 days no loan..the same words keep the app you qualify..don't be fooled!!

I was wrong about Branch application. I heard from my friends that Branch is the one & Only app which gives loan in low cibil score also. The experience has been so far very good. They don't harass you with calls or threatening messages. Really awesome service.
